sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_NM , G.GIS_ASSETS_MNG_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_OPER_DEPT_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOCPLC , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM , G.GIS_ASSETS_LNM_SUB , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE , G.GIS_ASSETS_AR , G.GIS_ASSETS_USAGE_YN , G.GIS_ASSETS_ACQ_PRI , G.GIS_ASSETS_STNDRD , G.GIS_ASSETS_BLDDATE , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_BLD_DT , G.GIS_ASSETS_RM , G.REG_USR , TO_CHAR(G.REGISTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGISTDT , G.UPD_USR , TO_CHAR(G.UPDTDT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPDTDT , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_GROUP_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_LOC_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_PRPRTY_SE_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_INVSTMNT_MTHD , G.GIS_ASSETS_GIS_CD , G.GIS_ASSETS_REAL_RENT_AR , G.DRW_LST_REGIST_YEAR , G.DRW_LST_SEQ , G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_AMT , TO_CHAR(G.GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') GIS_ASSETS_VAL_INQIRE_DT , G.ERP_ASSETS_SE_CD , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO , G.ERP_ASSETS_NO_SEQ , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_REGIST_YN , G.ERP_ASSETS_DISUSE_RSN , G.GIS_ASSETS_QUAY_CD , A.USAGE_AR , CASE WHEN NVL(A.USAGE_AR,0) > 0 AND NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0) > 0 THEN (NVL(A.USAGE_AR,0) / NVL(G.GIS_ASSETS_AR,0)) ELSE 0 END USAGE_RATIO , TO_CHAR(A.USAGE_PD_FROM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_FROM , TO_CHAR(A.USAGE_PD_TO, 'YYYY-MM-DD') USAGE_PD_TO FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G , ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F A WHERE G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sGisAssetsCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND A.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND A.USAGE_PD_TO <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
ORDER BY G.REGISTDT DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM GIS_ASSETS_CD_F G , ASSETS_RENT_DETAIL_F A WHERE G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE = A.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_CD AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD = A.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD = #sGisAssetsCd#
AND G.GIS_ASSETS_NM LIKE '%' || #sGisAssetsNm# || '%'
AND A.USAGE_PD_FROM >= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdFrom#||'000000','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
AND A.USAGE_PD_TO <= TO_DATE(#sUsagePdTo#||'235959','yyyy-mm-ddhh24miss')
